metadata.title: CVE-2021-32495 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Radare2 has a use-after-free vulnerability in pyc parser's get_none_objectfunction. Attacker can read freed memory afterwards. This will allowattackers to cause denial of service.

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
